name: Dunk a Duck
description:
Welcome to Dunk a Duck, a duck shooting game!

Goal: Shoot as many ducks as you can!

Controls:

Use your mouse to move the rifle, press the left mouse button to shoot. It's that simple!

Development: @me with C# and the Unity Engine
Art: @KenneyNL / https://kenney.nl
Sound: @Breviceps / https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/447910/

Project on GitHub for you to explore/modify/improve/sell or whatever you desire:

https://github.com/kiabdu/Dunk-a-Duck
